short_summary: Construction of warehousing and industrial buildings and a greenhouse.
description: Construction of warehouse and building Structures for a green field.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### (Phase 2) Powerhouse Structural Stabilization Project - Sault Ste. Marie Canal National Historic Site

#### Project Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01031172
* **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0013/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-30
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-06T14:00:00 (Expired)

#### Project Description

Parks Canada is seeking a qualified Prime General Contractor with Heavy Construction experience to stabilize the Powerhouse building at the Sault Ste. Marie Canal National Historic Site in Ontario.

The scope of work includes:

* Demolition and removal of penstock concrete reservoir and Historic Valve chamber
* Construction of a new contemporary Valve Chamber
* Installation of two refurbished Historic Valves in the original position
* Supply and installation of a stainless steel Y-pipe system
* New concrete works and supply and installation of a Passive Ground Water Management system
* Removal and reconstruction of the wing wall stair at the south of the Powerhouse Building
* Minor removal and repair work within the Powerhouse Building

#### Tender Requirements

* The project will be delivered through a two-stage selection process: Stage 1 (Qualification Evaluation) and Stage 2 (Financial Bid)

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-06T14:00:00 (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

#### Contact Information

If you are interested in this opportunity, please contact:

Sheldon Lalonde, Procurement Agent
Parks Canada Agency
134 Noble Street
 Cornwall, Ontario K6H 6S2
 Phone: 13435853836
 Email: [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca)

#### Pre-Submission Checklist

Before submitting an offer, please review the following:

* Ensure you meet the qualification criteria specified in the tender
* Review the detailed specifications and drawings provided
* Ensure you have all necessary documentation and information required to prepare your offer

Note: This tender has expired, and no further submissions will be accepted.  Regards, Yikes the Writer.
